page.title: 17Health
page.content: People sometimes worry about their health but not often unless they become ill. Lots of people have joined the jogging and running craze. We've just had a mini marathon in Bradford. Cancer worries people most because they don't know what causes it - the atmosphere, food additives, our way of life, radioactivity, asbestos, pollution? A few people have become concerned with their diet and patronise health food shops but most take only a superficial interest in their health. Too much eating causes obesity which is quite a problem among children as well as grown ups. Drugs and glue sniffing isn't a big problem in Bradford but children try smoking cigarettes still and alchohol abuse is a health problem.
